member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.Core.Deinitialize
member.summary: Deinitializes the platform. This is for internal use only. Do not call this function.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5InputSource.Joystick.TryGetControllerTypeFromDeviceClass(System.Int32,Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5InputSource.Joystick.ControllerType@)
member.summary: This exists because I do not know what the device classes are so I have to parse the string and guess.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadVibrationMode
member.summary: Gamepad vibration mode.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadVibrationMode.Advanced
member.summary: Required to use audio-based vibration. Normal motor vibration does not work in Advanced mode.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadVibrationMode.Compatible
member.summary: Approximates how a DualShock 4 handles vibration. Vibration mode must be set to either Compatible or Compatible2 to use standard motor vibration.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadVibrationMode.Compatible2
member.summary: Supposedly approximates how a DualShock 4 handles vibration even more accurately than Compatible mode. Vibration mode must be set to either Compatible or Compatible2 to use standard motor vibration.

member.summary: Weapon effect.

member.summary: Sets vibration level for a motor at a specified index.

member.summary: Sets vibration level for a motor at a specified index with a timeout.
member.param: Length of time in seconds to activate the motor before it stops. [0 = Infinite]

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.SetVibration(System.Int32,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets vibration level for a motor at a specified index.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.SetVibration(System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets vibration level for a motor at a specified index with a timeout.
member.param: Length of time in seconds to activate the motor before it stops. [0 = Infinite]

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.GetVibration(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets vibration level for a motor at a specified index.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.StopVibration
member.summary: Stops vibration on all motors.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.GetAccelerometerValueRaw
member.summary: Gets the raw value from the accelerometer as reported by the device. Note: Device coordinate system does not match Unity's.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.GetAccelerometerValue
member.summary: Gets the value from the accelerometer converted to Unity's coordinate system. The value returned could be thought of as a gravity vector and user acceleration combined. If using this value to apply a force in the direction of the vector, invert each axis first. This value represents the last value reported by the accelerometer.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.GetLastGyroscopeValueRaw
member.summary: Gets the raw value from the gyroscope as reported by the device. Note: Device coordinate system does not match Unity's.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.GetLastGyroscopeValue
member.summary: Gets the value from the gyroscope converted to Unity's coordinate system.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.GetOrientationRaw
member.summary: Gets the raw orientation as reported by the device. Note: Device coordinate system does not match Unity's.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.GetOrientation
member.summary: Gets the orientation converted to Unity's coordinate system.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.ResetOrientation
member.summary: Resets the orientation.

member.summary: Sets the motion sensor state.

member.summary: Sets the tilt correction state.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.SetAngularVelocityDeadbandState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the angular velocity deadband state.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.SetLightColor(UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Sets the light color. Alpha can be used to set intensity. Final light color may be modified by the PS5. Brigtness cannot be set below a certain value on this platform.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.SetLightColor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the light color. Final light color may be modified by the PS5. Brigtness cannot be set below a certain value on this platform.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.SetLightColor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the light color. Final light color may be modified by the PS5. Brigtness cannot be set below a certain value on this platform.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5ControllerExtension.ResetLight
member.summary: Resets the light to the default settings.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension
member.summary: Allows access to gamepad-specific functions.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.connectionType
member.summary: Gets the controller connection type as an int. This can be cast to UnityEngine.PS5Input.ConnectionType.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.maxTouches
member.summary: Number of simultaneous touches supported by this device.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.touchpadPixelDensity
member.summary: Gets the pixel density of the touchpad.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.touchpadResolution
member.summary: Gets the touchpad resolution in pixels.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.touchpadResolutionX
member.summary: Gets the touchpad X resolution in pixels.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.touchpadResolutionY
member.summary: Gets the touchpad Y resolution in pixels.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.touchCount
member.summary: The current touch count.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.GetTouchId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the touch id for the touch at the specified index.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.GetTouchPosition(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector2@)
member.summary: Gets the touch position for a particular index normalized to a 0 - 1 range. (Left = 0, Bottom = 0)
member.param: The index of the touch for which to return position.
member.returns: True if the touch at index is currently touching. False if there is no touch at index.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.GetTouchPositionByTouchId(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector2@)
member.summary: Gets the touch position for a particular touch id normalized to a 0 - 1 range. (Left = 0, Bottom = 0)
member.param: The id of the touch for which to return position.
member.returns: True if the touch at touchId is currently touching. False if there is no touch at touchId.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.GetTouchPositionAbsolute(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector2@)
member.summary: Gets the touch position for a particular index in absolute units as returned by the device. (Left = 0, Bottom = 0)
member.param: The index of the touch for which to return position.
X/Y position of the touch in absolute units.
member.returns: True if the touch at index is currently touching. False if there is no touch at index.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.GetTouchPositionAbsoluteByTouchId(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector2@)
member.summary: Gets the touch position for a particular touch id in absolute units as returned by the device. (Left = 0, Bottom = 0)
member.param: The id of the touch for which to return position.
X/Y position of the touch in absolute units.
member.returns: True if the touch at touchId is currently touching. False if there is no touch at touchId.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.IsTouching(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the current touch id is valid for any currently active touch.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadExtension.IsTouchingByTouchId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the current touch id is valid for any currently active touch.

member.summary: Sets the vibration mode for the gamepad.

member.summary: Sets vibration level on an individual motor.

member.summary: Minimum Strength value.

member.summary: Minimum Frequency value.

member.summary: Gets or sets value at position index.

member.summary: Converts this to a byte array.

member.summary: Copys values to desination array.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.IPS5GamepadTriggerEffect
member.summary: Interface for a gamepad trigger effect.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectOff
member.summary: Trigger effect that stops all effects.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectFeedback
member.summary: Feedback trigger effect. Trigger will resist movement beyond the start position.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectFeedback.position
member.summary: The starting zone of the trigger effect. [Valid values: 0-9]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectFeedback.strength
member.summary: The force of the resistance. [Valid values: 0-8]

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectWeapon
member.summary: Weapon trigger effect. Trigger will resist movement beyond the start position until the end position. Can be used to simulate a gun trigger, for example.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectWeapon.startPosition
member.summary: The starting zone of the trigger effect. [Valid values: 2-7]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectWeapon.endPosition
member.summary: The ending zone of the trigger effect. [Valid values: startPosition + 1 to 8]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectWeapon.strength
member.summary: The force of the resistance. [Valid values: 0-8]

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectVibration
member.summary: Vibration trigger effect. Trigger will vibrate with the input amplitude and frequency beyond the start position.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectVibration.position
member.summary: The starting zone of the trigger effect. [Valid values: 0-9]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectVibration.amplitude
member.summary: Strength of the vibration motor. [Valid values: 0-8]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectVibration.frequency
member.summary: Frequency of the vibration motor. [Valid values: 0-255 Hz]

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectMultiplePositionFeedback
member.summary: Multiple Position Feedback trigger effect. Trigger will resist movement at varying strengths in 10 regions.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectMultiplePositionFeedback.strength
member.summary: Strength [0-8] of the trigger motor at each position index [0-9]. Example: strength[0] = 8 sets maximum strength at trigger position index 0.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectSlopeFeedback
member.summary: Slope Feedback trigger effect. Trigger will resist movement at a linear range of strengths.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectSlopeFeedback.startPosition
member.summary: The starting zone of the trigger effect. [Valid values: 0-endPosition]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectSlopeFeedback.endPosition
member.summary: The ending zone of the trigger effect. [Valid values: startPosition + 1 to 9]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectSlopeFeedback.startStrength
member.summary: The force of the resistance at the start. [Valid values: 1-8]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectSlopeFeedback.endStrength
member.summary: The force of the resistance at the end. [Valid values: 1-8]

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectMultiplePositionVibration
member.summary: Multiple Position Vibration trigger effect. Trigger will vibrate movement at varying amplitudes and one frequency in 10 regions.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectMultiplePositionVibration.frequency
member.summary: Frequency of the vibration motor. [Valid values: 0-255 Hz]

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectMultiplePositionVibration.amplitude
member.summary: Vibration amplitude [0-8] of the trigger motor at each position index [0-9]. Example: amplitude[0] = 8 sets maximum amplitude at trigger position index 0.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectStates
member.summary: Information about gamepad trigger effect states.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectStates.leftTrigger
member.summary: Trigger effect state for the left trigger.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5GamepadTriggerEffectStates.rightTrigger
member.summary: Trigger effect state for the right trigger.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5Input
member.summary: Provides access to input-related methods and settings at runtime.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.PS5.PS5Input.pluginVersion
member.summary: Gets the current Rewired PS5 plugin version.

members.member: A class to allow initialization of the system from outside without exposing anything in PS5Input. This is just hidden away in the Utils namespace. Must be called to initialize and deinitialize the Game Core platform system.

member.name: M:Rewired.Utils.Platforms.PS5.Main.GetPlatformInitializer
member.summary: Initializes the Game Core platform. This is for internal use only. Do not call this function.
